dict.string:
Hi %|
The account %filltext:name=Twitter Handle:default=@% has been enabled for Conversational Ad format.
Here's the Conversational Ads Card URL to send to the advertiser:
* https://ads.twitter.com/accounts/%filltext:name=URL ID%/brand_insights/video_conversation_card
Access to conversational ads will be removed after 1 month from the planned start date. Download the [Conversational Cards Onboarding Guide for Clients|https://docs.google.com/document/d/1a-kUvvBE-6A_VvOSl9sPXw_DHT8giOxpIM7b4GmbYxQ/export?format=pdf] and share it with the advertiser.

Hi %|
Based on the planned completion date, this ticket should be completed.
Please confirm the final total deal price (%clipboard USD) related to this program so we can close this ticket. This data is critical in order for us to capture revenue reporting on Tableau.
Thanks!

I noticed that the handle has not been setup to receive DM from anyone. Currently you will need to be a follower else you can't DM the handle. Allowing DM from anyone (followers and non-followers) will help the DM automation campaign.
Please refer to [customer support blog post | https://blog.twitter.com/2016/announcing-new-customer-support-features-for-businesses] and get the client to activate it via this page: https://business.twitter.com/i/settings/support

Hi %|
Closing this ticket - feel free to re-open it if you have further questions. Thanks!

---- h4. Elevation Request
- Program start date: %filltext:name=MM DD:default= , 2018% - Program end date: %filltext:name=MM DD:default= , 2018% - Requested Rate Limit for DM creates/min (Initial Phase) (per 15 min): %filltext:name=DM per 15 minutes:default=5,000% - Estimated Rate Limit for DM creates/min (Final Phase) (per 15 min): %filltext:name=DM per 15 minutes:default=5,000% - Requested Total # of DMs per day (default: 1,000 for normal accounts / 15,000 for Verified): %filltext:name=Total DM per day:default=15,000% - Application ID through which DMs will be sent: %filltext:name=Application ID% (%fillpopup:name=popup 7:Proxima:UniqueVision:IC Group%) - Accounts which require elevated rate limits (The accounts on whose behalf DMs will be sent): @%filltext:name=Handle% h4. Project Synopsis h5. Team - %|, Brand Strategy, Strategist - , Sales, CP h5. Use Case 1. Brand promotes a tweet with DM card to lead User to DM 2. User goes into DM via DM card CTA to start conversation 3. User engages with bot to get information h5. Recurring DM Touch points Chatbot drives to follow the account for the future conversations/communications h5. Partnerâ€™s goals & how they will measure impact: - Goals: -- engagement and brand association - KPIs: -- number of DM card clicks -- traffic from Twitter to website -- new followers h5. Value to Twitter - $%filltext:name=Spend% for promoted tweets with DM cards. - It drives conversation between User and Business in both DM and timeline.
